com.github.aivancioglo.resttest.http

Class Response

  • com.github.aivancioglo.resttest.http.Response
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Model, ResponseImpl

    public class Response

    This class is using for HTTP/HTTPS response validation and processing.
